app.title: FR Applications for: {job_title} {job_classification}
get_priority_list: FR Contact Talent Cloud to get a list of priorities that applied to this position. They must be reviewed and considered first.
underConsideration.description: FR Review the applicants in the Veterans and Canadian Citizens section. If none or very few of these applicants meet the requirements, you can still consider non- candian - citizen applications in the Optional Consideration section
underConsideration.title: FR Under Consideration
optionalConsideration.title: FR Optional Consideration
optionalConsideration.description: FR In this group you will find the applicants who are not Canadian Citizens or do not claim to meet the essential criteria.
screenedOut.title: FR No Longer Under Consideration
screenedOut.description: FR These applications have allready been screened out.
screenOutAll: FR Screen All Optional Candidates Out
priorityApplicants.title: FR Priority Applicants
priorityApplicants.description: FR These are priority applicants for this position. They must be reviewed and considered first.
veteransAndCitizens.title: FR Veterans and Canadian Citizens
nonCitizens.title: FR Non-Canadian Citizens
essentialCriteriaFail.title: FR Don't Meet Essential Criteria
toggleAccordion: FR Toggle this step to view relevant applicants.
viewApplication.title: FR View this applicant's application.
viewProfile.title: FR View this applicant's profile.
backToApplicantList: FR < Save and Go Back to Applicant List
